Xcode now knows HTML

Mariusz Ozdoba

04 Dec 2018

Another day at the office and another suprise for our team. When working on some additional camera functionality Xcode suprised us with some unforeseen warnings about HTML b (which makes text between tags bold) tag not beeing closed.

Maybe some day front-end devs will switch to Xcode.
